# SERVER COMPONENT:

# Add to your app.r server section:
vocabulary_source <- reactive({
  switch(input$vocabulary_source,
    "current" = load_current_vocabularies(),
    "guidance" = load_guidance_vocabularies_when_ready(),
    "mixed" = combine_vocabularies()
  )
})
